name: Gooder Pages
description:
This style I've created makes the game and home pages better. It has a built-in AD block. It widens out the game page so when it blocks the ADs there isn't just an empty space on the right.

The Buy robux AD doesn't get blocked so I'd recommend getting this ADblock:
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/adblock/gighmmpiobklfepjocnamgkkbiglidom
